rules: Use generous spacing (p-6 or p-8) for cards.
Dashboard widgets must fill their height (h-full).
Sidebar should be fixed on desktop, collapsible on mobile.

card.style: bg-white border border-border rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

button.base: inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50

variants.outline: border border-input bg-background shadow-sm hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground

input.style: flex h-9 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

table.header: bg-muted/50 text-left text-xs font-medium text-muted-foreground uppercase tracking-wider

assets.icons: Use lucide-react for all icons. Examples: LayoutDashboard, Users, Package, ArrowRightLeft, LogOut, Search, Plus, Trash2, Edit, FileSpreadsheet.

visual_enhancers.gradients: None. Use solid colors and subtle borders.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-lg for dropdowns/modals.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: npm install lucide-react recharts clsx tailwind-merge
2. SETUP FONTS: Add Manrope and Inter from Google Fonts to index.html or import in CSS.
3. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and fonts defined above.
4. CREATE LAYOUT: Build a responsive SidebarLayout component with a collapsible sidebar.
5. BUILD DASHBOARD: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy. Create widgets for Total Assets, Assigned, Available, Employees.
6. IMPLEMENT TABLES: Create a reusable DataTable component with search, sort, and pagination.
7. FORMS: Use Shadcn-like form components (Label, Input, Select, Button) but styled according to the 'components' section.
8. LOGIN: Create a clean, centered login card with a professional look.
9. EXPORT: Add the 'Export to Excel' button prominently on the Asset Assignment page.
10. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects for sticky headers.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
